txt.en: This sculpture was carved by Bemwin, a skilled artist who loved the champion Darothild and made this representation of her shortly before she faced the Red-maid, and perished. It was taken into Mordor, but has returned and been cleansed of the evil that corrupted it. Elrond has imbued it with the Light of EÃ¤rendil, and believes it will help you banish the shadows of Mordor.
